sourcesContent:
List of Products

Product Image Product Name Product Type Product Price Delivery Status Quantity Remove
{{ product.productName }} {{ product.productType }} ₹ {{ product.productPrice }} {{ product.deliveryStatus }} {{product.quantity}}
Total price of the products : ₹ {{ (cart | sum : "total") }}
import { Component, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; import { ToastrService } from 'ngx-toastr'; import { errorMessage } from 'src/app/Services/Guard/product'; import { UserService } from 'src/app/Services/user.service'; @Component({ selector: 'app-cart', templateUrl: './cart.component.html', styleUrls: ['./cart.component.css'], }) export class CartComponent implements OnInit { public cart: any = []; public product: any = []; public product1: any; public uniqueCart: any; public id: any; user = localStorage.getItem('Active-User'); constructor(public userservice: UserService, public toastr: ToastrService) {} ngOnInit() { this.getCart(); } getCart() { this.userservice.getCart(this.user,"Ordered").subscribe( (res: any) => { this.cart=res if (this.cart.length == 0) { localStorage.removeItem('id'); } }, (err: errorMessage) => { this.toastr.error(`${err.status} Error ${err.name}`); } ); return this.cart; } delete(data: number) { window.confirm("Are you sure you want to remove this item?") if(true){ } } increment(data: any, name: string) { if (data.quantity >= 10) { this.toastr.info('You can add upto 10 units only !'); data.quantity = 10; } else if (data.quantity >= 1) { data.quantity++; data.total = data.productPrice * data.quantity; this.cart.map((element: any) => { if (element.productName == name) { return (this.id = element._id); } }); this.userservice.updateDelivery(this.id, data).subscribe( () => { this.getCart(); }, (err: errorMessage) => { this.toastr.error(`${err.status} Error ${err.name}`); } ); } } decrement(data: any, name: string) { if (data.quantity > 1) { data.quantity--; data.total = data.productPrice * data.quantity; this.cart.map((element: any) => { if (element.productName == name) { return (this.id = element._id); } }); this.userservice.updateDelivery(this.id, data).subscribe( () => { this.getCart(); }, (err: errorMessage) => { this.toastr.error(`${err.status} Error ${err.name}`); } ); } else if ((data.quantity = 1)) { this.delete(this.id); } } async checkout() { for (const element of this.cart) { element.deliveryStatus = 'Out for delivery'; const id = element._id; await this.userservice.updateDelivery(id, element).toPromise(); } this.getCart(); } }
